uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing

Class ButtonListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing.ButtonListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ButtonListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The ButtonListener Class implements ActionListener and is used to listen to the button and set the appropriate filename.
    Author:
    Ben Ashwell, Martin Key, Abel Toro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ButtonListener(ButtonPanel bp)
      The ButtonListener constructor sets up the link back to the ButtonPanel to pass the file name back.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      The action performed method implemented so that when a button is pressed it can set the right file name.
      void returnFile()
      Method to return the file name to the panel.
